X-Accepted-Oauth-Scopes: repo, repo:status, repo:deployment, public_repo, delete_repo, user, user:email, user:follow, admin:org, write:org, read:org, gist, site_admin, user:assets, user:assets:read
Access-Control-Expose-Headers: ETag, Link, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval

body.string:
[{"sha":"30b6f47245176d7f0c41849d5470bd2bede4775b","filename":"lib/octokit/configuration.rb","status":"modified","additions":4,"deletions":1,"changes":5,"blob_url":"https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/2097821c7c5aa4dc02a2cc54d5ca51968b373f95/lib/octokit/configuration.rb","raw_url":"https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/raw/2097821c7c5aa4dc02a2cc54d5ca51968b373f95/lib/octokit/configuration.rb","contents_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/contents/lib/octokit/configuration.rb?ref=2097821c7c5aa4dc02a2cc54d5ca51968b373f95","patch":"@@ -11,12 +11,14 @@ module Configuration
       :proxy,
       :oauth_token,
       :user_agent,
-      :auto_traversal].freeze
+      :auto_traversal,
+      :github_url].freeze
 
     DEFAULT_ADAPTER        = Faraday.default_adapter
     DEFAULT_API_VERSION    = 2
     DEFAULT_USER_AGENT     = "Octokit Ruby Gem #{Octokit::VERSION}".freeze
     DEFAULT_AUTO_TRAVERSAL = false
+    DEFAULT_GITHUB_URL     = "https://github.com"
 
     attr_accessor(*VALID_OPTIONS_KEYS)
 
@@ -41,6 +43,7 @@ def reset
       self.oauth_token    = nil
       self.user_agent     = DEFAULT_USER_AGENT
       self.auto_traversal = DEFAULT_AUTO_TRAVERSAL
+      self.github_url     = DEFAULT_GITHUB_URL
     end
   end
 end"},{"sha":"0111608c2150f170b621d21d8505e29282b7d166","filename":"lib/octokit/connection.rb","status":"modified","additions":14,"deletions":2,"changes":16,"blob_url":"https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/2097821c7c5aa4dc02a2cc54d5ca51968b373f95/lib/octokit/connection.rb","raw_url":"https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/raw/2097821c7c5aa4dc02a2cc54d5ca51968b373f95/lib/octokit/connection.rb","contents_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/contents/lib/octokit/connection.rb?ref=2097821c7c5aa4dc02a2cc54d5ca51968b373f95","patch":"@@ -9,9 +9,21 @@ module Connection
     def connection(authenticate=true, raw=false, version=2, force_urlencoded=false)
       case version
       when 2
-        url = "https://github.com"
+        if github_url
+          url = github_url
+        else
+          url = "https://github.com"
+        end
       when 3
-        url = "https://api.github.com"
+        if github_url
+          if github_url[/(https|http):\/\/(.*)/]
+            url = "#{$1}://api.#{$2}"
+          else
+            url = "https://api.github.com"
+          end
+        else
+          url = "https://api.github.com"
+        end
       end
 
       options = {"},{"sha":"4dfb8767369d4fc03cbc55b36018e492e828341c","filename":"lib/octokit/repository.rb","status":"modified","additions":5,"deletions":1,"changes":6,"blob_url":"https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/2097821c7c5aa4dc02a2cc54d5ca51968b373f95/lib/octokit/repository.rb","raw_url":"https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/raw/2097821c7c5aa4dc02a2cc54d5ca51968b373f95/lib/octokit/repository.rb","contents_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/contents/lib/octokit/repository.rb?ref=2097821c7c5aa4dc02a2cc54d5ca51968b373f95","patch":"@@ -30,7 +30,11 @@ def to_s
     end
 
     def url
-      "https://github.com/#{slug}"
+      if Client.github_url
+        "#{Client.github_url}/#{slug}"
+      else
+        "https://github.com/#{slug}"
+      end
     end
 
     alias :user :username"}]
